title: TU140 – Couples Therapy Through the Eyes of Experts: Ellyn Bader and Peter Pearson
description: Every couple has its ups and downs, but it's easy to think that our relationship is uniquely challenging. Experts in couples therapy and a couple themselves, Ellyn Bader and Peter Pearson join co-host Sue Marriott to discuss what most people get wrong about working with couples, and how to help get it right. Together, they'll dive into the dos and don'ts of couples therapy, from the perspective of the therapist and the patient.
itunes:subtitle: Common pitfalls in being a couple, and for therapists, for treating couples
itunes:summary: Learn what the most common request in couples therapy is and why it hides more than it reveals. Ellyn Bader and Peter Pearson expert guests.
itunes:author: Ellyn Bader, Peter Pearson, Sue Marriott, Ann Kelley
itunes:title: Couples Therapy Through the Eyes of Experts: Ellyn Bader and Peter Pearson
